programme.title: The Invincible James Lee
programme.desc: James Lee is a husband, father, avid athlete, and is about to become a double amputee. Follow James on his journey, from early doctor's appointments to the surgery room and eventual recovery.

programme.title: Kelly & Ramya
programme.desc: Kelly MacDonald, Ramya Amuthan and a team of blind and partially sighted contributors share arts, entertainment and lifestyle stories.

programme.title: Les enquêtes de Murdoch
programme.desc:
(S06EP03) Murdoch suspects a serial killer is at work when a string of seemingly random people are murdered inside their own homes. The only apparent connection between the victims is a street corner that they all visited shortly before dying.
Année : 2008

programme.title: Ça me regarde
programme.desc:
(S09EP28) On parle semaine québécoise de la déficience intellectuelle. Aussi, on vous présente une nouvelle émission sur les ondes d'AMI-télé, sur les innovations technologiques.
Année : 2008

programme.title: #IGotThis
programme.desc:
(S04EP02) In this episode of #IGotThis: A new disability. As the after-effects of COVID-19 are studied around the globe, two young men with extreme cases of long COVID are learning the impacts of this unfamiliar journey together.
Année : 2008

programme.title: L'appel du coeur
programme.desc:
(S06EP04) A new Mountie, Nathan Grant, arrives earlier than expected, surprising townsfolk, including Elizabeth and Abigail. No time for niceties, Bill and Nathan jump right to work when Lee's payroll is stolen from the stagecoach.
Année : 2014
Avec : Jack Wagner (Bill Avery) Pascale Hutton (Rosemary LeVeaux-Coulter) Kavan Smith (Leland Coulter) Lori Loughlin (Abigail Stanton) Daniel Lissing (Jack Thornton) Erin Krakow (Elizabeth Thatcher) Martin Cummins (Henry Gowen)

programme.title: You Can't Ask That
programme.desc:
(S01EP04) People on the autism spectrum face stigma and judgment, often because it shows no outward signs. Our panelists discuss what it feels like to be on the spectrum.
Année : 2014

programme.title: Les quatre sens
programme.desc:
(S02EP03) Singer-songwriter Amy Sky shares her recipe for pecan squares ; Christine makes sticky rice balls ; Carl prepares BBQ ribs ; and the health benefits of honey and bee pollen are explored.
Année : 2014

programme.title: Our Community
programme.desc:
Rock My House is a music school and rehearsal studio, but one of Kevin Eamon's main focuses is providing an outlet for people from local community-living groups to come in and unleash their inner rock-god.
Année : 2014

programme.title: Eyesoforst-l Job
programme.desc:
(S02EP01) Chris and Alex have a big job ahead of them making this new community workshop the best place it can be for themselves and the community. They install lumber storage for easy workflow and a dust collection system for easy breathing.
Année : 2014

programme.title: Les enquêtes de Murdoch
programme.desc:
(S13EP12) When a body is found during a fox hunt Murdoch and Brackenreid suspect a group opposed to the sport is responsible.
Année : 2008

programme.title: NOW with Dave Brown
programme.desc:
Join Dave Brown as he discusses the latest news, sports, entertainment and current events through a disability lens.
Année : 2008

programme.title: Attitude
programme.desc:
Pre-Christmas Juanita Willems is flat out, collecting, wrapping and distributing presents for foster children, even though Juanita is blind.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Attitude
programme.desc:
As their Outward Bound adventure continues, a group of people living with physical disabilities tackle their fear of heights, and a challenging waka journey.
Année : 2011

programme.title: L'appel du coeur
programme.desc:

Année : 2014

programme.desc:

programme.desc:
